name: Amazon Clone
description: Full E-Commerce application wih Stripe payment gateway

name: Netflix Clone
description: This is a clone of Netflix website built using React.JS as a Front-end & Firebase as Back-end. It's not a replica, and it doesn't have all the features of Netflix website. It contains the home page, browse page, and movie player.

name: Google Clone
description: Google Clone With React ( Hooks + Context API ) and Google Custom Search JSON API ( Programmable Search Engine )

name: Airbnb Clone
description: Airbnb Clone with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, SSG, API, SSR, Date-picker, Mapbox Integration

name: Slack Clone
description: In Slack Clone application, I build and deploy a Slack Clone application. Used Technologies: React.js, Firebase, Material UI.

name: Unichat Application
description: In this project, I built a full-fledged Firebase Chat Application. With social authentication including Google and Facebook using Firebase, online statuses, great design, and functionality, image support, sound notifications, the ability to create multiple rooms, and much more.

name: Facebook Clone
description: Building facebook application clone using React and Firebase. This build covers the core functionality (uploading normal text, images & videos) of original facebook application. The best thing of the build is, it is fully responsive and looks better in most of the devices.

name: VSCode Portfolio
description: A themeable and developer-centric portfolio based on the VSCode

name: NextJS Landing Page
description: This project is the NextJS Landing Page. In this application, I build and deploy NextJS Landing Page. Used Technologies: Next.js, React.js, Firebase, Theme UI

name: Autonomus-Car
description: This project is about the setting up of an autonomous raspberry pi-car and training it with data mining models.
